William Oren Graff

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Oran; Orrin
  2. Foster Name: Oran
  3. Foster Family: Edward D. and Martha D. Morris
  4. Location of Family: Salem, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Falls City, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 9
  8. Date of Birth: Unknown
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Falls City Journal, 27 March 1915; 1920 United States Federal Census; History of Richardson County, Neb., pt 2, p. 1099; Eloise Thomsen Corres. - 2 different correspondents.
